description:
I think Parker is the yummiest piece of man meat I've run across in a long time. This boy has the one of the most perfect back sides I've ever seen. I mean, his butt is pure perfection — round, muscular, and tight with just the right amount of fur. It is an ass that was made to be eaten.
Patrick has become very comfortable with the guy-on-guy thing and actually gives a pretty good blow job. So, I asked him about giving Parker's ass a good work over. He'd never done it before, but with a little pre-shoot instruction, he was good to go.
I loved watching these two hot studs going at it. I especially loved it when Patrick had Parker bent over the tub, soaping up his tight hole, getting it all nice and clean...
If you want to see the perfect awkward “straight boy” moment, make sure to catch the very end of this film!
title: Parker's Rim Job
